#Getting_data_of_the_selected_team
team_away=laliga20_21[laliga20_21['AwayTeam']=='Real Madrid']

#changing_the_names_of_columns
team_away = team_away.rename(columns = {'HomeTeam': 'Opponent', 'AwayTeam': 'Team'}, inplace = False)
team_away = team_away.rename(columns = {'FTHG': 'opponent_full Goals', 'FTAG': 'Team_full Goals','FTR': 'Full_Result',
                                        'HTHG': 'opponent_1st Goals','HTAG': 'Team_1st Goals', 'HTR': '1st_Result'}, inplace = False)

#creating_new_columns_by_applying_some_functions
team_away['Full_Result']=team_away['Full_Result'].apply(result_away)
team_away['1st_Result']=team_away['1st_Result'].apply(result_away)

#converting_type_of_some_columns_from_float_to integer
team_away['Team_1st Goals']=team_away['Team_1st Goals'].astype(int)
team_away['opponent_1st Goals']=team_away['opponent_1st Goals'].astype(int)

#creating_new_columns_by_applying_math_functions
team_away['Team_2nd Goals']=team_away['Team_full Goals']-team_away['Team_1st Goals']
team_away['opponent_2nd Goals']=team_away['opponent_full Goals']-team_away['opponent_1st Goals']

#creating_new_columns_by_applying_numpy_select_function
conditions = [team_away['Team_2nd Goals'] > team_away['opponent_2nd Goals'],
              team_away['Team_2nd Goals'] < team_away['opponent_2nd Goals']]
choices = ['W','L']
team_away['2nd_Result'] = np.select(conditions, choices, default='D')

#creating_new_column by_another_simple_method
team_away['where?']='Away'

#calculating_the_points_during_the_matches_and_halfs
team_away['1st_points']=team_away['1st_Result'].apply(points)
team_away['2nd_points']=team_away['2nd_Result'].apply(points)
team_away['Full_points']=team_away['Full_Result'].apply(points)

#rearranging_the_order_of_the_columns

source.4f2b4ed9:
HomeTeam == Team 

AwayTeam == Opponent

The team's goals in the first half==Team_1st Goals

The opponent's goals in the first half==opponent_1st Goals

The team's goals in the second half== Team_2nd Goals

The opponent's goals in the second half==opponent_2nd Goals

The team's goals in the full time== Team_full Goals

The opponent's goals in the full time==opponent_full Goals

First half result==1st_Result

Second half result==2nd_Result

Full match result==Full_Result
